nodes.text: Clone0000004 was the designation of a human male clone trooper from Kamino who served the Galactic Republic. By 19 BBY, he posted a five-star review of Kamino in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah. In his review, Clone0000004 said that he liked Kamino, however he was unsure whether or not the other clones agreed with his opinion.
Clone0000004 was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
